text: Fontana del Genio a Villa Giulia by Ignazio Marabitti. The Fontana del Genio a Villa Giulia or Genio di Villa Giulia is a sculpted water fountain in the park of the Villa Giulia in Palermo. It was sculpted by Ignazio Marabitti in 1778 and shows the Genius of Palermo. Genio Villa Giulia Category:Buildings and structures completed in 1778
title: Fontana del Genio a Villa Giulia
